hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Umar that he used to forbid silk and brocade, except for what was like this:Then he gestured with his finger, then a second, and a third, and a fourth (i.e., the width of four fingers), and he said: “The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to forbid it.”

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي الْعَلَمِ فِي الثَّوْبِ
chapter.eng-name: Concession with regard the emblem on a garment
